posts.content: three splitscreen van camper steering boxes brought from vw breakers over 30 years ago and been stored in cupboards sheds etc need a clean up might need adjusting I don't know father in law died so clearing out all his stuff and found them must be rare now so grab a bargain Â£100.00 each o v n o viewing welcome at b323ay area and phone no is 07899738619 for anymore information also found a vw badge been told its for a bay window all boxes now sold only badge left
